import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import './Home.css' function Home() { const[compName, setCompName] = useState('') const[contName, setContName] = useState('') const[contEmail, setContEmail] = useState('') const[phone, setPhone] = useState('') const inputRef = useRef(null) const handleSubmit = ()=>{ const body = {compName, contName, contEmail, phone} console.log(body) } useEffect(()=>{ inputRef.current.focus() },[]) return (

Business Survey

setCompName(e.target.value)} class="form-control" placeholder=" Company Name" />
setContName(e.target.value)} class="form-control" placeholder=" Contact Name" />
setContEmail(e.target.value)} class="form-control" placeholder=" Email"/>
setPhone(e.target.value)} class="form-control" placeholder="Contact number"/>
) } export default Home
